name: Escape (itch) (Marian Madalin)
description:
This is just a prototype that I made a few years ago and I have finally decided to publish it anyway. At that time I was just started developing video games and this was just a project to practice. After a big pause of making games I returned and from now on I will publish my crappy games here.

Requirements

  • SO: Windows
  • Processor: Intel Core 2
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 6670 or better
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

Controls

  • Move - W, A, S, D
  • Jump - Space
  • Crouch - C
